CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search relevance improvements in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search relevance improvements in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description:
Improvements to relevancy of search results in
Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and
personalized results based on interests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Tips revamp on Outlook Win32 desktop (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in Outlook Win32 to support additional top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Tips revamp on Outlook Win32 desktop (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in Outlook Win32 to support additional top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
CurrentVersion.description: The Hide Favorites feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden, users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
OldVersion.description:
The Hide Favorites
feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites
section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users
have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden,
users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
CurrentVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
OldVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio and video flyout and settings in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The Audio and Video Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings, eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make adjustments.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio and video flyout and settings in Teams meetings
OldVersion.description:
The Audio and Video
Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage
their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle
features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings,
eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make
adjustments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide general channel
CurrentVersion.description: Alike other channels, now you will be able to hide general channels in your teams, helping you focus on the channels that matter most to you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
OldVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
OldVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai language in Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: ,In our continued efforts to enhance classification capabilities, we have added a new feature, Word-Breaker, to our existing Thai Language support in Classification. Words in Thai language sentences do not have spaces between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on the right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy across all cloud locations (Exchange, Teams, One Drive, SharePoint).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on walkie talkie.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
OldVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preset Organizational Backgrounds (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: When enabled, a user will have a preset background defined by the IT admin without the ability to change the background.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Loop components in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: ,Tap into the real-time, online collaborative solution provided by Loop directly within the powerful multimodal OneNote canvas—the opportunities are endless. You can create or insert Loop components into your OneNote notebook. Navigate to Insert > Loop to create a new component or try pasting a link to an existing component to have it show up in your OneNote canvas.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

CurrentVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.
